center_panel.button-css: height: 25px; font-weight: normal; background-color: #444; color: #FFF; border: 2px solid #DD9955; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px;
center_panel.button-hover-css: font-weight: bold; background-color: #EEE; color: #555; border: 3px solid #884e0c; border-radius: 15px; padding: 15px;
center_panel.button-pressed-css: font-weight: bold; background-color: #333; color: #DDD; border: none;

settings-css.button-css: height: 20px; font-weight: normal; background-color: #444; color: #FF9922; border: 4px solid #FF9922; border-radius: 15px; padding: 15px;
settings-css.button-hover-css: font-weight: bold; background-color: #EEE; color: #555; border: 3px solid #884e0c; border-radius: 15px; padding: 15px;
settings-css.button-pressed-css: font-weight: bold; background-color: #FF9922; color: #AAA; border: none;
settings-css.card-css: text-align: left; border: 3px solid #555; border-radius: 20px; padding: 10px; background-color: #777; color: #FFF;

right_panel.chat-text-css: border: 4px solid #DD9955; border-radius: 20px; padding: 10px; background-color: #08384b; color: #FFF;
right_panel.user-message-css: vertical-align: text-top; border: 3px solid #DD9955; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px; margin-left: 10px; margin-right: 100px; background-color: #3F3F46; color: #FFF;
right_panel.ai-message-css: vertical-align: text-top; border: 4px solid #05668D; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px; margin-left: 100px; background-color: #EAEAEA; color: #111;
